bio: i am a crypto enthusiast and educator. i and my colleagues are involved in hosting twitter spaces ,meet ups ,hosting incubation hub for crypto.
contributionDescription: onboarding new users to crypto and blockchain as a whole. explaining layer 2 to diverse audiences and why ethereum needs layer 2 ecosystem.  educating the masses on optimism and why it is the best layer 2 out there coupled with a good number of projects build on it.
impactDescription: the masses have been educated on blockchain , ethereum , layer 2 projects like optimism . new developers have come to know about layer 2 and why its the best layer 2 around. due to the low gas fees in optimism network transactions in real life are feasible coupled up the security of ethereum ecosystem

fundingSources.description: we havent received any funds yet

pwCategorySuggestions: Blockchain Education, Community Building, Layer 2 Scaling
